string.text: Turning this on will allow "Wick Mode" and "Zone Slayer" to grant their old 30% reload speed bonuses to their appropriate weapons in addition to their current effects.\n \nTurning this off will not give those reload bonuses for those perks ("Rapid Reload" will be unaffected).

Turning this on will allow perks that have activated or timed effects to play a sound to let the player know their current state.
 Turning this off will turn off all perk sounds effects.
 
Sounds effects from perks will be modified base on your standard Master/Sound Effects setting.

Enabling this will allow you to start earning an additional perk point to spend every few levels based on your Prestige Level.
 Disabling this off will have you earn the normal amount of perk points, regardless of your Prestige Level.
 
Prestige Brackets: 
 %c[d_orange]Prestige 1-3: +1 additional Perk Point every 4 earned Levels 
 %c[yellow]Prestige 4-7: +1 additional Perk Point every 3 earned Levels 
 %c[d_green]Prestige 8-10: +1 additional Perk Point every 2 earned Levels
